meanings.definition: The condition of having more than two sets of chromosomes derived from the same species.
meanings.sent1: Autopolyploidies can result in increased genetic diversity within a species.
meanings.sent2: Scientists study autopolyploidies to understand how organisms adapt to changes in their environment.
meanings.sent3: The autopolyploidies at the genetic conference were the talk of the town.
meanings.sent4: Her garden was a beautiful display of autopolyploidies, with vibrant colors and varied shapes.
meanings.sent5: The concept of autopolyploidies fascinated the students, leading to lively discussions in class.

meanings.definition: The state of being an autopolyploid organism.
meanings.sent1: Autopolyploidies can confer advantages such as increased tolerance to environmental stress.
meanings.sent2: The autopolyploidies of certain plant species have been a subject of interest for botanists.
meanings.sent3: At the zoo, the autopolyploidies of the panda population made them stand out among other animals.
meanings.sent4: In the world of flowers, her garden was a true masterpiece of autopolyploidies.
meanings.sent5: The farmer marveled at the autopolyploidies of his crops, amazed by their resilience and productivity.
